description:
Features

The BlitzMax 5000 is the ultimate blending powerhouse. Its sleek design and powerful motor make it perfect for creating smoothies, soups, and more. Equipped with advanced blending programs and a 64-ounce container, it is engineered to tackle any blending task effortlessly.

5-Year Full Warranty

Blend with confidence, knowing your BlitzMax 5000 is covered for years to come.

Blending Programs

4 blending programs: Smoothies, Soups, Ice Crushing, and Pulse Mode.

Self-Cleaning Program

Simply add warm water and a drop of dish soap to activate the self-cleaning program.

64-Ounce BPA-Free Container

Designed for family-sized servings and larger batches.

Digital Timer

Precision blending with a built-in timer to achieve the perfect consistency.

Wireless Connectivity

The BlitzMax 5000 automatically adjusts settings based on the container size attached.

What's Included

  • BlitzMax 5000 Motor Base
  • 64-ounce Container
  • High-Speed Tamper
  • Recipe Guide
name: BlitzMax 5000
title: Blendify BlitzMax 5000
metaDescription: The BlitzMax 5000 is the ultimate blending powerhouse from Blendify. It combines high performance with a sleek design, making it ideal for smoothies, soups, and more.
specifications:
• Series: Ascent X
  • Container Capacity: 48 Oz.
  • Programs: 3
  • Touch Screen: No
  • Timer: Yes
  • Pulse: Yes
  • Self-Detect Technology: Yes
  • Dishwasher Safe: Yes
  • Dimensions: 9.75 x 7.75 x 17 in.
  • HP: 2.2 HP - peak
  • Warranty: 10 Years
